backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister's data types and state maps for clients, documents, trades, threads, profiles, and audit logs, including helpers for role checks and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic that adds a new tradeMap field to the actor state by transforming the old state into the new structure.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and requirement IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten descriptions summarizing the purpose of major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and theming variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication gating, profile-setup flow, and renders the main dashboard layout with nested pages.
frontend/src/auth/permissions.ts: Defines capabilities per business role and helpers to check permissions and derive visible modules.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines business roles and provides a function to validate and normalize an extended role string.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Renders the user management UI gated by manage_users permission with an empty state placeholder.
frontend/src/components/auth/PermissionG: Wraps children with permission checks, optionally disabling or hiding content based on capability.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Provides a profile creation dialog allowing users to enter personal info and select a role before saving.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Displays the Internet Identity sign‑in UI with error handling and notices.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientUp: Modal for creating or editing client records with PAN validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendEr: Shows an alert for backend errors, mapping auth-related messages to an Access Denied title.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Reusable empty-state card with optional illustration, description, and action slot.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor and exposes loading and refetch helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, storing identity state and exposing login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePermissions.ts: Computes the current user's business role and returns permission checks and allowed modules based on that role.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, clients, documents, and margin data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a slate-based color theme with utility classes for UI elements and status badges.
frontend/src/layout/DashboardLayout.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout with a role‑based sidebar, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Displays searchable, exportable audit logs with permission-gated export and error/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientManagem: Provides client search, bulk upload sample, and modal-based client creation with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/compliance/Regulatory: Shows calendar and list views for regulatory deadlines with empty states and deadline creation gating.
frontend/src/pages/config/ConfigurationH: Configuration hub linking to exchange settings, user management, and integrations, gated by permissions.
frontend/src/pages/config/ExchangeSettin: Exchange configuration page with a back button and empty-state placeholder for connection settings.
frontend/src/pages/config/IntegrationsPa: Integration settings page with notice about no email support and an empty-state for external system configs.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/components: React form component for entering manual trades with validation, error handling, and an in-session trade list.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/tradeImpor: Defines manual trade entry types and validation logic for required fields, numeric checks, and allowed sides.
Parses CSV trade import files into row objects using FileReader and custom CSV parsing helpers.
Validates parsed CSV rows, checks required columns and field formats, and converts valid rows into Trade objects.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/TradeImpor: Handles trade file upload, parsing, validation, import, manual entry, and viewing trade history with permissions.
frontend/src/pages/HowToUseGuidePage.tsx: Displays a multi-section instructional guide explaining platform usage, roles, and features.
frontend/src/pages/margin/MarginCollater: UI page showing margin and collateral metrics with tabs for snapshots, collateral, and reports.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Dashboard showing a how-to guide, key compliance metrics, alerts, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/reconciliation/BankRe: Bank reconciliation UI for uploading statements and viewing reconciliation runs with required CSV column info.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportLibrary: Report library page with search, navigation to scheduled reports and wizard, and an empty-state overview of templates.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportWizardP: Starter page for the report generation wizard displaying template selection and guidance.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ScheduledRepo: Displays the Scheduled Reports page with navigation, permission-gated create buttons, and an empty state for automated report schedules.
frontend/src/pages/surveillance/Surveill: Shows surveillance alert statistics and tabbed alert categories, each with empty states for pending or absent alerts.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Provides functions to export data arrays to CSV or JSON by generating downloadable files in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/src/validation/pan.ts: Validates a PAN string against the standard alphanumeric format using a regex.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state describing tasks to fix trade file upload, parse/import workflows, and backend persistence for imported trades.
